products.title: The Shawshank Redemption
products.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

products.title: The Godfather
products.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

products.title: The Dark Knight
products.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

products.title: Pulp Fiction
products.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

products.title: Forrest Gump
products.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more, through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

products.title: Inception
products.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

products.title: Fight Club
products.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

products.title: The Matrix
products.description: A computer hacker learns the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

products.title: Goodfellas
products.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

products.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
products.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to distract him from Frodo and Sam's mission to destroy the One Ring.

products.title: The Silence of the Lambs
products.description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer.

products.title: Se7en
products.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

products.title: Interstellar
products.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

products.title: Parasite
products.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between a wealthy family and a destitute household.

products.title: The Lion King
products.description: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

products.title: Gladiator
products.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

products.title: The Departed
products.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

products.title: The Prestige
products.description: Two magicians engage in a rivalry to create the ultimate stage illusion, leading to obsession and tragedy.

products.title: Saving Private Ryan
products.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed.

products.title: The Avengers
products.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

products.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
products.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, chronicling his rise and fall as a wealthy stockbroker living the high life.

products.title: Whiplash
products.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by a ruthless instructor.

products.title: Django Unchained
products.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

products.title: The Social Network
products.description: The story of how Facebook was founded and the lawsuits that followed its explosive growth.
Two British soldiers are sent on a dangerous mission to deliver a message that will save 1,600 men during World War I.
